original_text: Since therefore it remains for some to enter it, and those who formerly received the good news failed to enter because of disobedience,
korean_text: 그러면 거기에 들어갈 자들이 남아 있거니와 복음 전함을 먼저 받은 자들은 순종하지 아니함으로 말미암아 들어가지 못하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Since therefore it remains for some to enter it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 어떤 사람들이 그것에 들어가는 것이 남아 있으니,

sentences.original_text: and those who formerly received the good news
failed to enter because of disobedience,
